meanings.definition: Small white or gray flakes of dead skin in a person's hair.
meanings.sent1: She brushed off the dandruff from her hair.
meanings.sent2: My sister uses a special shampoo to treat her dandruff.
meanings.sent3: The dandruff on his head looked like tiny snowflakes.
meanings.sent4: The dandruff scattered on his shoulders like confetti.
meanings.sent5: The dandruff was so noticeable, it seemed to dance in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A scalp condition characterized by flaking skin.
meanings.sent1: His dandruff problem made him feel self-conscious.
meanings.sent2: Regularly washing your hair can help reduce dandruff.
meanings.sent3: The dandruff on his head seemed to have a mind of its own.
meanings.sent4: Her dandruff was like a constant reminder of neglecting self-care.
meanings.sent5: The dandruff was so persistent, it felt like a tiny army invading his scalp.
